website_summaries.verdict: These comfortable, supportive sandals give you options. Several fun colors. Five points of adjustability. What's not to love?
pros: Comes in black, blue, brown, coral, denim, grey, oyster and white
Microfiber lined, foam-cushioned footbed with added arch support
cons: Toes can get caught between the many straps

customer_reviews.title: Walk miles, no pain in your feet.  I am a senior, not particulally thin.  Trust me. Smile again while walking pain free
customer_reviews.text: Before wearing these, ( I bought 3 pairs, various colors) I was not able to walk, comfortably, even a block. Now I walked an hour or more at Disney, and did not have any pain or discomforte in my feet, and was able to have a wonderful time....Buy them and start walking without any feet pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sandal because every strap adjusts, but, it would be nice if shoe manufacturers learned that people who have big feet do not necessarily have fat feet. I tighten all sandals and always have extra strap left and can barely reach velcro. These shoes are better than most, but it is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Lady

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, bad fit, very disappointing for Propet shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely sandal, very attractive and made very well. I love Proper shoes but had to return this one. My little toes keep sticking put between the foot straps and the strap was long with just a short trip of velcro on it. I could not tighten the shoes enough but the velcro was weak and wouldn't stick together. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DJ's Bike

customer_reviews.title: 4E width is actually an M.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace an old pair of Propet sandals (style "Keeley") that were built on the same style of sole. In Propet sandals, I usually wear a 8.5 2E but I ordered an 8.5 4E. As you can see in the photo, these shoes, in a 4E width, are significantly narrower than a similar Propet style in a "2E" width. Apparently, these shoes do not actually come in "wide". These were returned. If you don't need wide shoes, these might be okay. When I tried them on, I did notice the little toe issues other reviewers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10N and a lot of times they are still too wide. All my shoes tie so that they fit snug. I bought these sandals hoping because I can NEVER find sandals without my feet swimming in them. These are to die for!!! I put them on and adjusted the Velcro at all the points and was ready to go. Seriously so very comfortable! I am thinking I am going to buy another pair. I have never been so pleased with a shoe purchase, EVER!!
customer_reviews.author: Gutsy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are amazing. They are so comfortable right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are amazing. They are so comfortable right out of the box. I have flat feet, pronating ankles, history of fracture of the left ankle with tendon repair of the right. I wore these all day, no foot pain, no leg fatigue; excellent arch support; no rubbing or pinching anywhere. I will be getting these in every color I can. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Super Registered Nurse

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mother for Mothers day. She is diabetic and has big feet (size 11) LOL, and really seems to have problems finding well fitting shoes. She wore these sandals to a wedding and reception and they looked very nice with her pant suit. Definitely dressy enough for this type of event as well as being able to wear them with regular everyday attire. She made it a point to let me know they were very comfortable, especially for being on her feet for hours that day helping prepare for the wedding events. The velcro straps make these sandals an excellent choice for people with wide feet!
customer_reviews.author: Jammie L. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Tired of getting messed up items returned by others
customer_reviews.text: I think I got these for such a cheap price because someone had already returned them. I couldn’t wear them because of the strap around the ankle. It was like it was sewn in in the wrong place and wouldn’t lay flat once buckled. Tired of getting things others have returned
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and very comfortable sandals. Love the Velcro adjustable straps. Only wished the last strap was a bit longer as I have a high instep and it just closes on the tip. Otherwise great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable & attractive
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I have edema in my foot and they fit no matter what due to the all adjustable sizing in the shoe. I love that they do not look like granny shoes but are modern and attractive. They are very comfortable, quiet when walking and easy to adjust. A perfect 10. I also bought them in black. Thank you Propet!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the double-wide shoe (4E) and it is a half inch less wide than another pair that I bought at my local shoe store that was a wide (2E). The entire shoe is more petite than it should be. The quality also seems poorer than my other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Labeled wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Great length and quality ,but this shoes are not wide at all. I bought the extra extra w and I definitely know they are labeled wrong.,this is not a wide shoe . I have bought other shoes from other brands extra wide and they are great . I was having high hopes for this ones cause my feet get swollen very often and to meet important to have comfortable, wide shoes., these ones are not it.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Attractive sandals and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The color and comfort are great! I normally wear an 8Med but ordered a half size smaller because some shoes run a little large. I think an 8 would actually have been just right but the 7-1/2 is OK after I adjust the straps. I have a high instep so the ankle strap could have been a little longer. A size 8 would have fixed that problem. I would recommend ordering the size that you normally wear. These problems were my fault. Even with these minor issues, I love the sandals and would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie48

customer_reviews.title: A weird kind of wide
customer_reviews.text: Pros -- Soft leather, cushiony insole, cute Cons -- I ordered the wide width, but the sole of the shoe was narrow compared to my other shoes. The straps were long, however, so I think the wide was a regular width sole with longer straps. I thought about keeping them because they were cute, but I found some Skechers sandals in store which fit me better so I returned the Propet. I hope this helps anyone considering purchasing this sandal in wide.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Annie

customer_reviews.title: cute and supportive too!
customer_reviews.text: Really supportive and it's great that all the straps adjust. Just don't adjust them in a library or church because they are Velcro and a little noisy. 4 stars out of 5 because they irritate the top of my feet just a bit, but i am confident that they will break in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Mismarked
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two pair, both marked same size, one fits, one I couldn't fit my foot into. I was too busy to send back so I donated but decided no more ordering shoes on Amazon. big mistake since I am a 4E and the one that didn't fit may not have even been a wide. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Brumit

customer_reviews.title: Return shipping is NOT free!  Strange fit around the ankle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered narrow width, and the straps were fine on the foot, but the strap around the ankle was very strange. It left a gap that was not adjustable. The ankle strap seemed too high up. Returned but BEWARE: you get charged for return shipping! it's not worth buying online unless you get free return shipping, unless you're positive it's going to fit.
customer_reviews.author: PMG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I like this sandals. They are very comfortable and look good. I expected with the size I bought they would be big and they were. My feet are wide in the front so I'm always looking for comfortable shoes and adjustable sandals. I settled for the size because I got them on sale but the straps hang over a little more than I like. Again that's just because I bought them in a very wide width. I would recommend them as they still look good and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: My usual size is a 9 1/2 wide, and the sandals I bought are 9 1/2 wide. They fit perfectly and are super comfortable! They have Velcro straps, which are perfect for when my feet get puffy! I absolutely love them and hope to buy them in other colors! The leather is nice and soft, and the sandals were super comfortable the first time I wore them!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandal...but
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for....I wear an Arizona Boot and these sandals opened up so I could put my foot inside the boot and then adjust the straps. Now the problem, I returned them because there is a heel. Not much of one but when you have handicapped feet the heel was too much. I liked them they would have been perfect BUT....if you have normal feet I recommend them, if you wear any kind of AFO, think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Dress sandals that fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have very large feet and very large bunions. I ordered size 10 and chose the widest width. Every strap on these shoes is Velcro. They can be custom fit on your feet by adjusting the straps. They have a small heel height so they are easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes are cute and also very comfortable. I broke my left foot 9 years ago and since have had the instep fused. Many shoes make my foot ache horribly and don't have enough support. These fit well, with many ways to adjust and also have a padded insole for my touchy foot.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Parenteau

customer_reviews.title: Pain is not a bff.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes hurt my toes! I noticed that the rigid sole has an odd shape/angle when compared to another style of sandals from same manufacturer, Prophet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color and Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe and I am very hard to fit. My feet swell due to health issues, and I was able to adjust the straps during my recent visit to Texas. I am going to order another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Diana D

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and I love the fact that all the straps are adjustable for a perfect fit. One reviewer said the Velcro didn't match but it did on my shoes so that is not a concern. I wore them all day the first time I had them on and they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, love the wide fit
customer_reviews.text: These have become my go to sandals. They're very comfortable and sturdy. They're completely adjustable and easy to put on. Love all my propet shoes
customer_reviews.author: LittlePinkFlowers

customer_reviews.title: Arch support
customer_reviews.text: The length of these are about a half size too long. Other than that they are great arch support. They are for my elderly mom who needs low shoes with arch support. We have to exchange cause she will trip on them being too long.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal alternative for those with hard to fit feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good sandal- it is great that it is fully customizable with every single strap being adjustable!! It is rather flat though, and doesen't offer much in the way of arch support, but otherwise it's a great alternative for those like me with hard to fit feet!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Corda

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 extra wide and these are true to size. They are actually extra wide and are very comfortable. I bought these in black and have worn them for a year. I can wear them all day without my feet hurting. I saw the coral color and bought those this month. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: seebasl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute style, looks great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this shoe and now I finally do, we both buy Propet sandals every year because of the fit and comfort. She has a high arch and instep, I have flat narrow feet , these shoes always fit and last.
customer_reviews.author: Denice Adams

customer_reviews.title: Do not order if you have wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to finally find a sandal that fit my 4e foot... but I was disappointed. The footbed is so narrow that my foot spilled over the edge. The straps did not cover my foot very well. Basically my foot looked super fat and not cute. I know I have large feet, but I don't want them looking like sausages exploding out of their casings! I will be returning these, which is a shame. Hopefully I can find some sandals before springtime.
customer_reviews.author: Jinxadorah

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandals
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a navy sandal in my size. Good fit. Dressy enough for garden wedding this summer. Heel is shaped nicely while sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: VickySM

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: When these sandals arrived it was obviously more narrow than all the other sandals I bought the same week, from the same manufacturer, in the same size. The color was not as expected either. Very disappointed in this particular size/color/model.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki B.

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these sandals but they're just OK. The side velcro straps stick up & look floppy/sloppy. I'll wear them but wouldn't recommend nor buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyGal

customer_reviews.title: The sandal itself was well made and pretty. I ordered a 92E and the bottom on ...
customer_reviews.text: Way, way too narrow. The sandal itself was well made and pretty. I ordered a 92E and the bottom on the shoe didn't even cover my foot bed. I thought they would be great as I had ordered a pair of walking shoes that fit perfectly in the same size. Was HUGELY disappointed. Couldn't believe they were so far off.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria leydecker

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Fit wide, felt seam knots, Velcro flaps did not stay down so show looks sloppy. Returned and got April fisherman style.
customer_reviews.author: Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable for each foot.
customer_reviews.text: There are five areas that can be adjusted to fit the foot. Really helpful. Cool and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not wide width
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 2e, but bought a 4e. The sides of my feet were hanging off the edge by quite a bit. Plus, the Velcro straps were too short. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: LolaInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, adjustable, non-clunky sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, non-clunky comfort sandals with nicely padded soles that are infinitely adjustable. My mom found that perhaps they run a little long. Good for wide feet. Had to return because they were a bit too wide at the heel, and we couldn't adjust downward enough. She ended up keeping the 8 1/2's, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Love the comfort❤
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I have stress fractures in the ball of my left foot which causes a lot of pain and swelling. I can wear these shoes all day with no pain or swelling. They are super cute too, kinda looks like a modified gladiator sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Darlenena Porter

customer_reviews.title: Wedge sandal
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits fine. The heel is a little narrower than I am used to, and it tends to roll a little when I walk. This is not the fault of the shoe. As I will be wearing it for dress and not shopping, it really doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: susanlk

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable - Not Granny Looking
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I was afraid that these would look granny, but they do not. I now have them in three colors. I wear a 7W and they fit as expected. Each strap adjusts for a custom fit.
customer_reviews.author: CincyCouple2

customer_reviews.title: The back strap is so long
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really cute and probably comfortable from my initial try-on however I had to return them because the back strap is so long it will not fasten. I normally wear an 8.5 and tried both an 8.0 and an 8.5. The strap was even too long on the 8.0. You would have to have really fat feet and ankles for this shoe to fit.
customer_reviews.author: pchemcat

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are soft and comfortable. If you need a lot of arch support
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are soft and comfortable. If you need a lot of arch support, this isn't the shoe for you. The strap that goes behind the ankle so long, it goes way past the spot to attach it to Velcro. It actually goes all the way to where the strap that goes across the top of the ankle attaches.
customer_reviews.author: Junie Spoonie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the few pairs of shoes I can wear all day! So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Measuring your foot first.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sandals , size W was not W for my W feet, bit long and narrow for my feet, Other than that, they are nice looking shoes, I went back for a shorter length and doubled wide, like 4E, wish me luck,
customer_reviews.author: gloria rios

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my sister's birthday and she loves them. I bought her black ones last year and she wanted Navy ones for her birthday this year.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic from Woodstock, GA

customer_reviews.title: Cute and adjustable sandal
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe and comfortable. Wouldn’t use for long walking trips. Good for going out but not excessive walking.
customer_reviews.author: Odessa M.

customer_reviews.title: Run very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are adorable and a nice color. However, I have a D width foot. Tried three sizes, the last being XXW (the widest available) and they were still too narrow. A shame, as they are really cute. Not the right shoe for my type of foot.
customer_reviews.author: Wade McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent. Especially when you can adjust all the straps. However, I expected much more comfort from Propet. I haven't had problems in the past, but this is so uncomfortable that I can't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Sister

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe but was WAY too big everywhere. This is the same size I wear in all the Propet shoes I have. Had to send back
customer_reviews.author: upintheair

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, beautiful sandal hold for dress clothes or jeans. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Burns

customer_reviews.title: SUPER comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love LOVE these shoes. Thinking of buying a few more pairs. They are SUPER comfortable, and all straps can be adjusted for fit. I recently had back surgery and these are very comfortable to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berks

customer_reviews.title: Well made & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, fit is good & well made....only complaint is they should have made the strap that goes across the ankle a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Rego

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very comfortable.I love that the straps allow you to adjust tightness. They fit like a glove and I can wear them all day. I think I could have taken a half size smaller but it doesn't matter a whole lot. Was a little surprised at the color. I was expecting from the picture a brown taupe, but got more gray instead. Still happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandal. Upper is real leather. Can be adjusted to fit foot perfectly. I really do like Propet walking sandals.
customer_reviews.author: tucsonlady

customer_reviews.title: Returned, ill fitting and missing a stud.
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately. Didn't fit my foot well and there was a missing cosmetic stud, which once noticed couldn't unsee it.
customer_reviews.author: A514

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like Propet as they fit my feet have some support and or not to expensive. This wedge is especially good as it has more support.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Arnold

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: my little toe sticks out, gave them to my daughter fits her fine, she wears the same size, love propet sandals Love bahama style the best but where are they I hope they didn't stop making them
customer_reviews.author: Betty S.

customer_reviews.title: I have some wonderful Propet sandals already that fit great
customer_reviews.text: I have some wonderful Propet sandals already that fit great, so I checked the sized and ordered the same. This sandal is for someone with a fat foot, not a wide foot. When I compared my old sandal with this new one it was a lot more narrow but it fit on around my foot just not the width of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Propet Shoes Are The Best
customer_reviews.text: The Propet shoes are so comfortable. I have four pairs of these shoes and they are the best. When these shoes arrived, I put them on and found that there was no need to break them in. I will continue buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Tim's super wide
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality. Runs very wide. I can normally wear 7.5AA narrow in place of 8AAA (slim) as long as the toes are open. But in this sandal I really need 7.5AAA. But keeping since can cinch ankle strap to keep relatively stable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven/Karen

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great (10M) and they're very comfortable but I'm looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: I plan to return these. The fit is great (10M) and they're very comfortable but I'm looking for a navy or dark blue shoe and this looks more gray than anything. It's blue-gray in some light and very gray in others so although they are comfortable, I don't need this color, whatever it is!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie D

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. Fit very well. Nicely made and looks great on. Heel height is nice, and they are a nicer casual shoe. I liked that they could be adjusted everywhere and still look nice. Unfortunately, they did not work out for my odd feet. My ankle is skinny so the back strap didn't have enough velcro to attach....and my pinky toe wanted to escape between the front two straps...frequent problems for me. If you don't have those issues, I think you'll like this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RUTH A TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: The velcro does not match the color of the shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: The velcro does not match the color of the shoe; the velcro is red while the shoes are "coral." The velcro shows when worn on my wide feet. Also, the color is called "coral," but I would call it more of a dark orange.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Hi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these. I've worn them for hours at a time & experienced no blisters or sores, which I normally experience with most sandals I try. They were marked down in price significantly, which makes it even better. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and the comfort of the sandals. I wore them all day today without any problem I am very hard to fit so, I like the idea of Velcro to help with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Wide widths have longer straps, but sole is much too narrow
customer_reviews.text: For the extra wide widths the straps are longer, but the sole (base) of the shoe is exactly the same (or even more narrow) than a normal width shoe, so the shoe is much too small for a wider foot. This results in the sides of one's foot handing over the edges and a very uncomfortable (and improper) fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable width
customer_reviews.text: Finally a wide sandal that is not too wide in a wide width. Nice low heel and straps. Only gave 4 stars because the material could be a little better quality. Comfortable and good price though
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Supper cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The fit is perfect and they're super cute. Thinking of ordering another color.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dress sandal! Very comfortable for long days on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: Every strap is adjustable!! incredible fit and nice squishy all-day comfort. These are not hiking sandals though. The sole is for indoor or nonslip surfaces. Very well made. Will be back for more!!
customer_reviews.author: kristin anderson

customer_reviews.title: My new faves!
customer_reviews.text: I think these may be the best shoes I’ve ever worn Fit , comfort , AND really cute! You can’t go wrong with this brand!
customer_reviews.author: theCRAB

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect. They are adjustable in four areas
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect. They are adjustable in four areas. The sizing is correct and they are very well made. They live up to the Propet name.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I wear an 8. 5 and they fit as ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 and they fit as expected, but my short pinky toes keep popping out over the strap which makes them uncomfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: AAAmy

customer_reviews.title: straps too short
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I thought I could adjust the straps to fit my feet as they swell during the day. But the straps are too short allow that much adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color
customer_reviews.text: Like the color but I did not particularly like the style for a walking shoe. Will wear them more for dress.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and very comfortable. How can you go wrong with the cushioned inside and every strap adjustable? I need function more than style, but these have enough style to go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: U.  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals however I ordered a wide which I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals however I ordered a wide which I usually do. I could have used a regular. They run a little wide. But the extra width actually feels good in this heat wave!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mason

customer_reviews.title: They are fully adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice-looking and fully adjustable. Can be worn as both casual and semi-dressy.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not too fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Looks cuter in the picture than on my feet. They are comfortable, but not very fashionable. Size runs a little large
customer_reviews.author: T. Goulet

customer_reviews.title: and it fits perfect. This is my normal size
customer_reviews.text: Lucky to get this shoe at a lower price. I ordered in 11W, and it fits perfect. This is my normal size, so true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Charming

customer_reviews.title: Believe the sandals might have been seconds not first quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that the sandals weren’t made as well as expected. They were not comfortable and one seems larger than the other. I most likely will not buy that brand again
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Wide width is true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Wide width and adjustable so you can make them a bit more snug. Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Kind Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, the style & the fit. I like the Velcro adjustment strips after 7 foot surgeries.
customer_reviews.author: Valann

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my mom for her to have safe comfy work shoes. She wears them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for these shoes. So easy to put on, and take off for my wife. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Cutlip

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Shoe also fits fine...adds a dash of color to any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nipper

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i have these from department store then bought from here and way cheaper price but still great quality
customer_reviews.author: sydney53003

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Like all my Propét sandals, these are most comfortable. The colour is neutral and all the straps make them easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota Sheril

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the style but mostly the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Farabee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these because my ankle was too thick for the strap. Cute sandals though.
customer_reviews.author: belqis

customer_reviews.title: Sandal just as described
customer_reviews.text: This sandal looks just as photo, comfortable to wear, easy to adjust to fit any foot. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Regina harvell

customer_reviews.title: Not enough arch support
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit as expected but didn't have the support needed for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Achand

customer_reviews.title: MIL loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my MIL. She is hard to fit. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Pam L.

customer_reviews.title: size not right
customer_reviews.text: these were super long ! the velcro strap around the ankle was not long enough. If they had fit better they would have been super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: craftygal

customer_reviews.title: I love Propet but have found discrepancies in the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they were too big. I love Propet but have found discrepancies in the sizing. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable shoe. Easily adjusts as foot/feet swell throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Alva

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These were so comfortable out of the box I bought two pair
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Niemann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. The padded sole is just what I need on tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: stardustsara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Fit well and very comfortable. Loved them so much I've ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Evans

product_meta.title: Propét Women's Aurora Wedge Sandal
product_meta.description:
Soft, full grain leather upper with leather lining is the perfect fit with wide widths and five adjustable hook and loop straps at forefoot, instep and heel. ortholite® foam insole with added arch support and microfiber sock lining keep your comfortable all day.

Propet is a rapidly growing shoe company dedicated to making the worlds best walking shoes. Propet shoes are better walking shoes because they're designed and manufactured to be your most comfortable walking experience ever. Extra attention is paid to giving your foot support where it is needed, more cushy comfort where it counts and more room where your foot's moving parts need freedom when walking. The result has to be tried to be believed! Shouldn't you be wearing the world's best walking shoes?
